港大學生要求停課之聯署聲明

（Please scroll down for English version）
（如欲聯署，請按入此連結：https://forms.gle/uDUQxRVVDDEqt2bT9 ）

需要HKU email

面對疫情爆發，港共政權為粉飾太平，拒絕實施出入境管理措施，更執意就《禁止蒙面規例》上訴，將政治考慮淩駕於公眾安全，更任由醫護人員淪為政治工具，醫治大批中國患者。我等對此表示強烈譴責。

香港大學早前曾按衛生防護中心指引，安排懷疑感染武漢肺炎的同學送院。相關同學曾到訪明華綜合大樓及太古堂，校園安全未能保證。故此，我等要求校方：

一）立即停課直至武漢肺炎疫情受控
二）強制要求所有中國入境的學生進行健康申報
三）謝絕一切中國旅行團到訪校園
四）公開所有疫情控制措施及實行情況，以及所有於校內發現的受感染或有可能受感染之案例

我城人心惶惶之際，我校定當肩起守護學生的責任。危急存亡之秋，我等亦當與同學並肩作戰。

發起團體：香港大學學生會二零二零年度中央幹事會候選內閣

Joint Statement of HKU Students Regarding the Request of Suspension of Classes

(To sign the petition, please click on this link https://forms.gle/uDUQxRVVDDEqt2bT9 )

In face of the outbreak of Novel coronavirus (Wuhan Pneumonia) epidemic, the Hong Kong-Communist Regime refused to implement the immigration management measurement in the attempt to paper over the cracks. Moreover, they insist on appealing the Prohibition on Face Covering Regulation, putting political considerations above public safety. Medical staff are even forced to become a political tool to provide treatment for the huge amount of Chinese patient. We hereby express our vigorous denounce in response.

The University of Hong Kong has previously arranged the students who were suspected of being infected with Wuhan Pneumonia to the hospital in accordance with the guidelines of the Centre for Health Protection. The students in question visited Meng Wah Complex and Swire Hall. Such caused doubts among the students about the safety of the campus. Seeing as such, we would like to demand the school to:

1. Suspend all classes until the Wuhan Pneumonia epidemic is under control
2. Implement mandatory health declaration from all students crossing the border from China
3. Decline all Chinese Tour groups from entering and visiting the campus
4. Disclose all epidemic control measures and their application and any infected or suspected case on campus

During this time of crisis, the University shall shoulder the responsibility of protecting the students. We shall always stand by the students in this crucial time.

Organizer: Proposed Cabinet of Executive Committee, The Hong Kong University Students' Union, Session 2020
